Class SingleNode<T>

java.lang.Object
cp213.SingleNode<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the SingleNode data type
public final class SingleNode<T> extends Object
DO NOT CHANGE THE CONTENTS OF THIS CLASS. The individual node of a linked structure that stores T objects. This is a singly linked node. The node link can be updated, but not the node datum, in order to avoid copying or moving values between nodes. Data structures must be updated by moving nodes, not by copying or moving data.
Version:
2022-10-26
Author:
your name, id, email here

  • Constructor Details

    • SingleNode

      public SingleNode(T datum, SingleNode<T> next)
      Creates a new node with datum and link to next node. Not copy safe as it accepts a reference to the datum rather than a copy of the datum.
      Parameters:
      datum - the data to store in the node.
      next - the next node to link to.

  • Method Details

    • getNext

      public SingleNode<T> getNext()
      Returns the next node in the linked structure.
      Returns:
      The node that follows this node.

    • getDatum

      public T getDatum()
      Returns the node datum. Not copy safe as it returns a reference to the datum, not a copy of the datum.
      Returns:
      The datum portion of the node.

    • setNext

      public void setNext(SingleNode<T> next)
      Links this node to the next node.
      Parameters:
      next - The new node to link to.
